Texto: 
na
none for this lesion.
non contrast ct shows a 2.1 cm right adrenal lesion with a chunky peripheral calcification.  differential includes adenoma, prior granulomatous infection or, less likely pheochromocytoma.
in and out of phase mri of the adrenal glands show a 2.2 cm right adrenal mass which demonstrates signal drop out on the out of phase sequence.
adrenal adenoma
see above
71 y/o male had chest ct for evaluation of a nodule seen on cxr.  subsequent mri was performed to evaluate the right adrenal gland.
